# Gradowo, Warmian-Masurian Voivodeship

Gradowo  is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Barciany, within Kętrzyn County, Warmian-Masurian Voivodeship, in northern Poland, close to the border with the Kaliningrad Oblast of Russia. It lies approximately  north-west of Barciany,  north of Kętrzyn, and  north-east of the regional capital Olsztyn. Between 1975–1998, the village administratively belonged to Olsztyn Province.
Voivoidship Road 591 (DW591) runs through the village.
